	branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/nsswitch: .
body: 62 (return) [ Syropulus is pleased to reckon seven hundred prelates in the council of Basil. The error is manifest, and perhaps voluntary. That extravagant number could not be supplied by _all_ the ecclesiastics of every degree who were present at the council, nor by _all_ the absent bishops of the West, who, expressly or tacitly, might adhere to its decrees.]
